Package Project2

Class MagicCharacter

java.lang.Object
Project2.BaseCharacter
Project2.MagicCharacter
public class MagicCharacter extends BaseCharacter
The MagicCharacter class represents a character with magical abilities, extending the BaseCharacter class. It equips a FireballScroll and provides information about the character's class type.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MagicCharacter()
    Constructs a MagicCharacter with default attributes and equips a FireballScroll.

      public String getClassType()
